alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 22 at 8:54AM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Colorado, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Kansas, Wallace, Logan, Gove, Greeley and Wichita Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Blowing dust is expected with the high winds, be alert for lowering visibility and reduced air quality.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. Have necessary medical equipment ready if sensitive to poor air quality.
